verbs.description: neurologize (third-person singular simple present neurologizes, present participle neurologizing, simple past and past participle neurologized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To reduce to a matter of neurology; to treat as neurological.
examples: My discussion is not in any way intended to neurologize the subject of empathy. Rather, I am simply suggesting that certain disturbances in the perception and expression of emotion among neurologically impaired may be relevant  […]
